name: UAC Bypass Using PkgMgr and DISM
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using pkgmgr.exe and dism.exe (UACMe 23)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:*\\pkgmgr.exe AND process.executable:*\\dism.exe AND winlog.event_data.IntegrityLevel:(High OR System))`
